title.narrative: PERTINENT AND QUALITY EDUCATION

description.narrative: By 2016, pre and primary schools in prioritized areas have improved capacities to provide pertinent, quality education services, which contributes to Learning And Child-Friendly Schools, Learning Outcomes. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2016, children and adolescents, especially those living in prioritized Amazon, Andean regions and marginalized urban areas, have increased access to quality education improve their level of learning achievements

participating-org.narrative: FONDAZIONE L ALBERO DELLA VITA ONLUS
FUNDACION IBEROAMERICANA DE DERECHOS DE INFANCIA Y FAMILIA

sector.narrative: Provision of multiple-levels (or alternative pathways of education) teacher training
Provision of parental education for school readiness (including in temporary learning spaces)
System strengthening - curricula and learning materials design (excluding early-learning / pre-primary)
System strengthening - early learning / pre-primary policy, leadership, and budget
System strengthening - inclusive education for children with disabilities
System strengthening - mother tongue / multilingual education

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By 2016, pre and primary schools in prioritized areas have improved capacities to provide pertinent, quality education services
Number of trained education officials that have received technical assistance under the child-friendly school initiative to mainstream gender and environmental education
Number subjects on which educational materials are developed and distributed
Number of national, regional and provincial education officials that have received training to improve education coverage and quality
Number and percentage of principals and teachers that have functional knowledge of IBE
Number and percentage of principals and teaches that have functional knowledge of gender mainstreaming
